per_frame_1=t = time*2.3;
per_frame_2=t2 = sin(treb_att+mid_att)*2.89;
per_frame_3=t3 = sin(mid_att+treb_att)*2.23;
per_frame_4=wave_x = wave_x + 0.350*( 0.70*sin(2.221+bass_att) + 0.30*sin(1.821*time) );
per_frame_5=wave_y = wave_y + 0.350*( 0.30*sin(1.942*time) + 0.70*sin(2.522+bass_att) );
per_frame_6=wave_r = wave_r + 0.790*( 0.60*sin(0.823*t3) + 0.40*sin(0.916*t2) );
per_frame_7=wave_g = wave_g + 0.790*( 0.60*sin(0.900*t2) + 0.40*sin(1.023*t2) );
per_frame_8=wave_b = wave_b + 0.790*( 0.60*sin(0.808*t2) + 0.40*sin(0.949*t3) );
per_frame_9=rot = rot + 0.010*( 0.60*sin(0.038*time) + 0.40*sin(0.054*time) );
per_frame_10=dx = dx + 0.002*( 0.60*sin(0.434*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_11=dy = dy + 0.002*( 0.60*sin(0.384*time) + 0.40*sin(0.477*time) );
per_frame_12=//zoom = (sin(treb_att-mid_att));
per_frame_13=warp = (sin(time)/2)-(bass_att-mid_att);
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=decay=1;
per_frame_16=//zoom=1.000;
per_frame_17=speed=0.80;
per_frame_18=speedinv=1-speed;
per_frame_19=q1=(qa*speed + bass*speedinv);
per_frame_20=q2=(qb*speed + mid *speedinv);
per_frame_21=q3=(qc*speed + treb*speedinv);
per_frame_22=qa=q1;
per_frame_23=qb=q2;
per_frame_24=qc=q3;
per_frame_25=flux=sin(time/2);
per_frame_26=q4=flux * 0.5 + 0.5;
per_frame_27=q5=flux;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    // sample previous frame 3 times, creating radial blur
warp_5=`    float2 v = normalize(uv - 0.5)*aspect.xy;
warp_6=`    //v = v.yx * float2(1,-1);
warp_7=`    v *= texsize.zw*3;
warp_8=`    ret = 0.25*(   tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz
warp_9=`                   +  tex2D(sampler_main, uv + v*2.5 ).xyz
warp_10=`                   +  tex2D(sampler_main, uv + v*5.5 ).xyz
warp_11=`                   +  tex2D(sampler_main, uv + v*-4  ).xyz
warp_12=`    );
warp_13=`
warp_14=`   // sample previous frame, with some trails...
warp_15=`    float trail_decay = 0.25*GetBlur1(uv);
warp_16=`    ret -= tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz*trail_decay;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`    
warp_19=`    // darken over time
warp_20=`//    ret -= .006;
warp_21=`}
warp_22=`
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`
comp_5=`
comp_6=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz*2 +
comp_7=`              GetBlur1(uv)*5;
comp_8=`
comp_9=`ret *= 0.3;   
comp_10=`
comp_11=`}
